org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.remotese.transport.impl.java

Class LocalClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.remotese.transport.impl.java.LocalClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DtoNode, DtoSender, ClientNode

    public class LocalClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClientNode
    Client side of the java-based local transport. For unit testing purposes. only one server per JVM
